mutants.original_line: valid = {num & x for x in valid} | {num}
mutants.mutated_line: valid = {num & x for x in valid} & {num}

mutants.original_line: valid = {num & x for x in valid} | {num}
mutants.mutated_line: valid = {num & x for x in valid} ^ {num}

mutants.original_line: valid = {num & x for x in valid} | {num}
mutants.mutated_line: valid = {num | x for x in valid} | {num}

mutants.original_line: ans = min(ans, min(abs(x - target) for x in valid))
mutants.mutated_line: ans = min(ans, min((abs(x + target) for x in valid)))

mutants.original_line: ans = min(ans, min(abs(x - target) for x in valid))
mutants.mutated_line: ans = min(ans, min((abs(x * target) for x in valid)))
